'Tim Matheson' (born 'Timothy Lewis Matthieson'; December 31, 1947) is an
American actor, director and producer. He is perhaps best known for
his portrayal of the smooth-talking Eric "Otter" Stratton in the 1978 comedy
[[National Lampoon's Animal House]] and the bitter Vice President John Hoynes in
the NBC drama, [[The West Wing]] and has had a variety of other well-known
roles, including providing the voice of the lead character in the cartoon TV
program [[Jonny Quest (TV series)|Jonny Quest]].
